participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, Emily enjoys imaginative activities and loves to share her thoughts.
participant_1.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to go to disney world every year.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Jake enjoys talking about his dreams and thoughts, even if others find it hard to understand.
participant_2.background: i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i'm four years old.
